description: Weekend? Looking for a friends get together? Need to relax as a friends group? We have cottages of two different categories. Here you can relax and anjoy the climate with your friends.

cottages.description: Ever dream of having a Royality in life? We can assure a Royal feel while staying here.
Who can dislike a Salt and Pepper look? What if we got it in our room? We have black and white cottage which is absolutely suitable for a photo session.
